text: Stamatov () is a Bulgarian surname, derived from the male given name Stamat, itself derived from Greek name Stamatis meaning "stopper" (stamata means "to stop"). It may refer to: *Georgi Stamatov (1893–1965), Bulgarian actor and director. *Georgi Porfiriev Stamatov (1869–1942), Bulgarian writer. *Varban Stamatov (1924–1998), Bulgarian writer, marine novelist, publicist and editor. ==See also== *Stamatopoulos, Greek surname *Stamatović, Serbian surname Category:Bulgarian-language surnames
title: Stamatov
